segments.text: Hello , Madam . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I've been sent over from Turner Interiors . They said I need to collect some sort of L / C ? Do you have it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I certainly do . Here it is , an Export L / C from Tokyo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should be from Sayuri Beds . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . Sayuri Beds , Tokyo , Japan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what I want ! Do you need me to sign anything ? Or fill in some forms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just sign right here , please . That's everything you need to do .
segments.speaker: S1
